lifeCycle.name: 页面生命周期
lifeCycle.compatibility:
|  | Android | iOS 系统版本 | iOS | web |
| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |
| onInit | x | x | x | x |
| onLoad | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onShow | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onReady | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onHide | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onUnload | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onPullDownRefresh | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onReachBottom | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onShareAppMessage | x | x | x | x |
| onShareTimeline | x | x | x | x |
| onAddToFavorites | x | x | x | x |
| onPageScroll | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onResize | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onTabItemTap | x | - | x | 4.0 |
| onNavigationBarButtonTap | x | - | x | x |
| onBackPress | √ | - | x | 4.0 |
| onNavigationBarSearchInputChanged | x | - | x | x |
| onNavigationBarSearchInputConfirmed | x | - | x | x |
| onNavigationBarSearchInputClicked | x | - | x | x |
